nodes.text: The LRRL-75 rocket launcher was a type of rocket launcher produced by Czerka Arms by the time of the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The mercenary Corso Riggs owned a LRRL-75, which he named Bitsy.
The Czerka Arms LRRL-75 rocket launcher was first mentioned in Corso Riggs's entry in the 2012 reference guide, Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia.
